remarks: Vector membership in the constructed full vector space H. (Contributed by NM, 20-Feb-2014.)
statement:
dvhvbase.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvhvbase.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhvbase.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhvbase.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhvbase.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dvhelvbasei $p |- ( ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ S e. E ) ) -> <. F , S >. e. V ) $.
